Welcome to ``ssh2awsec2`` Documentation
==============================================================================
Release as a placeholder on PyPI.


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``ssh2awsec2`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install ssh2awsec2

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade ssh2awsec2
